We started with vermú-- lovely vermouth on ice with a bit of....

Very mediocre food

review: Después de visitar el Palacio Real en Madrid me vine aquí a comer. Me encanto el lugar y el ambiente es muy bonito. Es un poco caro el restaurante pero.... name: Casa Lucio

Huevos Rotos is a simple dish with French fries, sunny side fried eggs, and salchichón....

name: The Mad Café
address: Calle de la Cava Alta, 13, 28005 Madrid, Spain
review:

name: La Cabaña Argentina

name: TriCiclo

name: Marina Ventura

review:

name: Bacoa
address: Carrera de San Jeronimo, 3, 28014 Madrid, Spain
review: Lo mejor de comida lo tienen ustedes, mi hija me invito a este restaurante una vez y todo fue una delicia. My goodness, one of the best burgers I've had. name: Emma Cocina
address: Plaza de San Miguel, 4, 28005 Madrid, Spain
review:
Wonderful lunch for only 12.60 Eur within walking distance of most of the popular tourist destinations! We got to choose from a list of 5 starters, 5 main.... Delicious and authentic. The best croquetas. Only
one server for the whole restaurant but the food was very good.. CoZy and warm little spot in the middle of touristy madness.  Delicious food .. highly recommend pork cheek stew and tuna cubes with tomato confit.

name: Yerbabuena
address: Calle de los Bordadores, 3, 28013 Madrid, Spain
review: Great little place for menu del dia at 12 euros. Clean and quiet. Each dish is made fresh and the little dessert  jars are fantastic!. Best Vegetarian food I've had so far in Spain. One of the best vegetarian restaurants in Madrid!.

name: Salmón Gurú
address: Calle de Echegaray, 21, 28014 Madrid, Spain

Very tasty food ,amazing ,delicious ,and the waiter Dimity alias ( Mihai )was so knowledgeable regarding the food recommendations  so 5 stars,best.

name: Casa Toni
address: Calle de la Cruz, 14, 28012 Madrid, Spain
review: This spot is as good as people say - tasty tapas, large portions, friendly (and English-speaking!) service, and located right in the center of Madrid. We.... review:

name: Celso y Manolo

name: Cacao Restobar
address: Calle de Moratin, 19, 28014 Madrid, Spain
review:
Awesome.  The best sangria I've ever had.  

Octopus was amazing, and the staff was super friendly.. Everything was delicious.  The vegetarian corn arepas was amazing!!  Highly recommend!!!. Not that bad, but all's too sweet or too salty which comes as a surprise given the place's rating.

name: La Ciudad Invisible

name: La Mayor

name: El Cogollo

name: Los Porfiados

name: La Pescadería

name: La Campana

name: Casa Labra
address: Calle Tetuán, 12, 28013 Madrid, Spain
review: First food stop on my tapas tour, this place was super busy at 7pm on a weeknight. There is no seating, only a few hightop tables outside and some low.... That's why I went a second time. They let people order food and drinks one hour before closing, than 15 minutes later, they decided it....

name: Taberna La Concha
address: Calle de la Cava Baja, 7, 28005 Madrid, Spain
review:
The vermouth cocktail was absolutely amazing, as well as the tapa of the day. 6 euros for two cocktails and two tapas. Can't beat that!. I've been places.  Time to talk about them.  Let's start in Madrid, at the place where any respectable tapas crawl on Calle Cava Baja should begin, Taberna.... Out of Country Review - Spain

name: Alhambra
address: Calle de la Victoria, 9, 28012 Madrid, Spain
review:

review:
Reseña en ingles y español.

name: Las Cuevas de Luis Candelas

name: MartinaCocina

name: Algarabía
